title: pEsak-kELIrO engaL piLLai
sahitya:
pEsak-kELIrO engaL piLLaik-kaniyamudu kiLLai mozhi mazhalai perumai 
peru nanda gOpa maharAjan piLLaik-kaniyamudu kiLLai iLa mozhi mazhalai


anupallavi

  AshaiyuLLa rAjagOpAlanAna yyan pEshum mazhalait-tannaikkANa 
vAsa naru malarin vaNNamum nANa vAyinuL IriraNDE dantam kANa


caraNam    mati mukham tulanga varum azhagODu maNam kamazha mati kavarndiDum adhikamAna
taTam poliva-dirunudaliDai en tiram kanindaduvO malaralarndu kani kizhinda
neyyODu madu kalandu kannal vAviyODu kaNNan iLavAyamudam pera kAdal 
aNaindaduvO pATaka nUpura kankaNa kinkiNi nATakamADiya vAcakamO 
nATakam Adiya vAcakamAnadu nEshamarAduru mAdhavamO 
mAdhavamIdena mAdhavanAnena mAdhavaninradu en tavamO 
mandamurum naghai andamurumpaDi cintai kavarndadu en tavamO
mOhana mOhana mOhanamO mOnaka mOnaka mOnakamO
bOdhaka mAmaraiyO maraiyO vEdakamOdiya nUtanamO
mAdanamenrirundu nAthanuminrezhundu vAtanamum mozhindapaDi
